|brand = Acer |model = UWA4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/02/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Acer_UWA4 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = HLZUWA4, PANWL8211 |icid = 1754A-UWA4 |boardid = 10G031900-0B |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8811AU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 433 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/25/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "[[CC&C]] WL-8211-V1" and "10G033000-0B" is silkscreened on the board. :This dongle is targeted for use with certain '''Acer''' projectors.
==See also== *[[Acer UWA2]] - USB WiFi Adapter :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA2 HLZUWA2] (2013-04-19) :OEM: [[CC&C WL-6210-V3]] ([[CC&C]]) *[[Acer UWA3]] - USB Wireless Adapter :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA3 HLZUWA3] (2014-07-18) *[[Acer UWA4]] - Wireless Projection Kit :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA4 HLZUWA4] (2018-04-25) :OEM: [[CC&C WL-8211-V1]] ([[CC&C]])
